creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Portrait of Toshiyori in a Hitomaro inspired pose. Above are drawings of white and pink shikishi with gold shita-e. The poem is, according to the box inscription, in the hand of the thirteenth abbot of Nishihonganji, Ryonyo (1612-1662).
medium: ink and light color on paper
title: Minamoto Shunrai (or Toshiyori)
